title: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities (IntraCommunity Transfers of Defence Related Products) (Amendment) Regulations

title: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities (IntraCommunity Transfers of Defence Related Products) (Amendment) Regulations
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities (IntraCommunity Transfers of Defence Related Products) (Amendment) Regulations
heading: 2. Regulation 2 of the European Communities (Intra-Community Transfers
text_raw:
2. Regulation 2 of the European Communities (Intra-Community Transfers 
of Defence Related Products) Regulations 2011 (S.I. No. 346 of 2011) is 
amended, in paragraph (1), by the substitution of the following definition of 
‘Directive’: 

‘Directive’ means Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and of the 
Council of 6 May 20092 simplifying the terms and conditions of transfers of 
defence-related products within the Community as amended by – 

(a) Commission Directive 2010/80/EU of 22 November 20103 
amending Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and 
of the Council as regards the list of defence-related products, 
(b) Commission Directive 2012/10/EU of 22 March 20124 amending 
Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and of the 
Council as regards the list of defence-related products, 

(c) Commission Directive 2012/47/EU of 14 December 20125 
amending Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and 
of the Council as regards the list of defence-related products, 

(d) Commission Directive 2014/18/EU of 29 January 20146 
amending Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and 
of the Council as regards the list of defence-related products, 

1 OJ L225, 25.6.2021, p.69 
2 OJ L146, 10.06.2009, p.1 
3 OJ L308, 24.11.2010, p.11 
4 OJ L85, 24.3.2012, p.3 
5 OJ L31, 31.1.2013, p.43 
6 OJ L40, 11.2.2014, p.20 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 15th October, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [514] 3 

(e) Commission Directive 2014/108/EU of 12 December 20147 
amending Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and 
of the Council as regards the list of defence-related products, 

(f) Commission Directive (EU) 2016/970 of 27 May 20168 
amending Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and 
of the Council as regards the list of defence-related products, 

(g) Commission Directive (EU) 2017/433 of 7 March 20179 
amending Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and 
of the Council as regards the list of defence-related products, 

(h) Commission Directive (EU) 2017/2054 of 8 November 201710 
amending Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and 
of the Council as regards the list of defence-related products, 

(i) Commission Directive (EU) 2019/514 of 14 March 201911 
amending Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and 
of the Council as regards the list of defence-related products. 

(j) Commission Directive (EU) 2021/1047 of 5 March 202112 
amending Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and 
of the Council as regards the updating of the list of defencerelated products in line with the updated Common Military List 
of the European Union of 17 February 2020.

title: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities (IntraCommunity Transfers of Defence Related Products) (Amendment) Regulations
heading: 3. European Communities (Intra-Community Transfers of Defence Related
text_raw:
3. European Communities (Intra-Community Transfers of Defence Related 
Products) (Amendment) Regulations 2019 (S.I. No. 291 of 2019)11 are revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

6 October, 2021. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment.
